text.name: Statesman's Quil
text.description: The Statesman's Quill reduces the cost of surrender to 20% of the total cost of troops you have in your army.

text.name: Diplomat's Fine Curl
text.description: The Diplomat's Fine Curl reduces the cost of surrender to 10% of the total cost of troops you have in your army.

text.name: Minister's Shield of Peace
text.description: The Minister's Shield of Peace reduces the cost of surrender to 10% of the total cost of troops you have in your army.

text.name: Ring of the Wayfarer
text.description: When placed on the finger, this ring increases the combat speed of all your units by +1.

text.description: The Nomad's Boots of Mobility increases your movement on land.

text.name: Sailor's Astrolabe of Mobility
text.description: The Sailor's Astrolabe of Mobility increases your movement on sea.

text.name: Angel Wings
text.description: The Angel Wings allow you to fly.

text.name: Helm of Mana
text.description: The Helm of Mana returns 1 extra spell points per turn to your hero.

text.name: Power Ring
text.description: The Power Ring returns 2 extra spell points per turn to your hero.

text.name: Spellscroll of Prophecies
text.description: The Power Ring returns 3 extra spell points per turn to your hero.

text.name: Collar of the Magician
text.description: The Collar of the Magician extends the duration of all your spells by 1 turns.

text.name: Enchanted Hourglass
text.description: The Enchanted Hourglass extends the duration of all your spells by 2 turns.

text.name: Sorcerer's Robe of Conjuring
text.description: The Sorcerer's Robe of Conjuring extends the duration of all your spells by 3 turns.

text.name: Lightning Rod
text.description: The Lightning Rod causes your air spells to do 50% more damage to enemy troops.

text.name: Sphere of Earth
text.description: The Sphere of Earth causes your earth spells to do 50% more damage to enemy troops.

text.name: Everhot Lava Rock
text.description: The Everhot Lava Rock causes your fire spells to do 50% more damage to enemy troops.

text.name: Evercold Icicle
text.description: The Evercold Icicle causes your water spells to do 50% more damage to enemy troops.

text.name: Sphere of Negation
text.description: The Sphere of Negation disables all level 3 or higher spells for both sides, in combat.

text.name: Arm of the Martyr
text.description: The Arm of the Martyr disables all morale bonus for both sides, in combat.

text.name: Masthead
text.description: The Masthead gives +1 luck and +1 morale on sea.

text.name: Heart of Fire
text.description: The Heart of Fire provides to you all spells in the school of Fire Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

text.name: Heart of Water
text.description: The Heart of Water provides to you all spells in the school of Water Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

text.name: Heart of Earth
text.description: The Heart of Earth provides to you all spells in the school of Earth Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

text.name: Heart of Air
text.description: The Heart of Air provides to you all spells in the school of Air Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

text.name: Boots of Levitation
text.description: The Boots of Levitation allows to you to walk across water.

text.name: Golden Bow
text.description: The Golden Bow eliminates 50% penalty for your troops shooting past obstacles.

text.name: Wand of Negation
text.description: The Wand of Negation makes all your troops inmune to dispel magic spells.

text.name: Broach of Vulnerability
text.description: The Broach of Vulnerability negates the natural magic resistance of all creatures on the battlefield.

text.description: The Ring of Vitality increases the health of all your units.

text.name: Ring of Life
text.description: The Ring of Life increases the health of all your units.

text.name: Vial of Blood
text.description: The Vial of Blood increases the health of all your units.

text.description: The Pendant of Total Recall makes all your troops immune to Paralyze.
